name: interiorly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
on or from the inside: We may not have had much money in our family, but we were all rich interiorly. This is an architecturally impressive building, interiorly as well as exteriorly.
More examplesFewer examplesEventually, she accepted the facts of the matter interiorly.I feel that I am finally able to understand interiorly how I can become a better person.The church was first used for services in 1889, but it was not completed interiorly until three years later.
